page.title: 07A Marldon Boys Day
page.content: At 8.45 a.m.on a Sunday morning my alarm clock went off. I got out of bedand went downstairs and washed. Then I got dressed. The bells of the churchstarted to ring at 9 o'clock,so I went to church on my white rally racer. When I got to church I went in and changed. We wear a red cassock and a white cottar which is a sort of short shirt. After singing in the choir, I go home. I usully see my dad and then my auntie turns up. When she goes we have dinner. This week we had roast pork, potatoes, carrots, peas, swede and gravy. In the afternoon I usually go outside and play on my bike. After tea I sit and watch T.V. I like watching quiz shows. Sometimes I play on my computer. I go to bed at 9.30 p.m.
